messages.title: WE WILL CUT THE DEFICIT, NOT THE NHS
messages.content: Our National Health Service is a fantastic institution – there for all of us when we need it, regardless of our background or ability to pay. It embodies everything which is truly great about Britain. That is why the modern Conservative Party has made the NHS its number one priority. We back it, we want to build it and improve it for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative Party commits to protecting spending on the NHS in real terms, intending to cut the deficit, not the NHS. The government will increase spending on the NHS every year, aiming to provide the best world class drugs and treatment available to patients free on the NHS, with the lowest mortality rates for conditions like cancer and heart disease. They also plan to train and hire an additional up to 100,000 more live savers to avoid premature death every year.

issues.economy: We will cut the deficit, not the NHS.
issues.health: We back the NHS, we want to build it and improve it for everyone.

contactInformation.address: Unionist Buildings, Nicholas Street, Chester CH1 2NX

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a survey asking constituents about their views on the NHS and the next government's priorities.
